src/components/Activity.tsx.description: Activity is a component that lists the log of the task.

src/components/Board.tsx.description:
Board is the main feature of the app. 
It includes all tasks categorized in columns by their statuses.

src/components/ContextProviders.tsx.description:
ContextProviders inits and provides all contexts used in the app.
It includes providers as follows:
  - ThemeProvider for styled-components theme
  - TasksContext.Provider - managing tasks
  - TaskEditorContext.Provider - managing editing tasks
  - UserContext.Provider - managing users

src/components/NavigationBar.tsx.description: NavigationBar implements a navigation bar with a user selector inside.

src/components/Task.tsx.description: Task is displaying a task title and handles clicks on it.

src/components/TaskEditor.tsx.description:
TaskEditor is a component where all the task management operations are performed.
It implements a form for creating/editing a task.
It includes the activity log.
It works like a modal.

src/components/TaskForm.tsx.description: TaskForm is a component dedicated for task form only.

src/components/UserSelector.tsx.description: UserSelector user UserContext for displaying and selecting users.
